CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 6, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "In 'Command Performance' - Some of Pittsburgh's loveliest young ladies will appear in the coming Centre Avenue YMCA show, 'Command Performance,' as will many singing, dancing and comedy acts. Among them will be this group of girls which Chuck Fly, topflight dancer and instructor, is preparing for one of the dancing skits. The girls are, from left to right: Gloria Jackson, Mamie Hamilton, Evelyn Newell, Barbara Robinson and Carol Shelton. Chuck Fly is also the director of the entire 'Command Performance' show. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dancer Chuck Fly standing in front of dancers Gloria Jackson, Mamie Hamilton, Evelyn Newell, Barbara Robinson and Carol Shelton posed in Centre Avenue YMCA for preparations of "Command Performance" variety show
